name: Winter Night
description:
Game genre: Horror, Survival, Mystery (point and click adventure horror game). The game "Winter Night" presents a story inspired by beliefs in Thailand.
Players will experience the atmosphere of an ancient, mysterious guesthouse and the intrigue of exploring an old house where horrifying events have occurred.

This game emphasizes puzzle-solving and the excitement of escaping from the house. Players must think quickly and use their skills to assess the situation.

In the game, Mintra is the main character who encounters mysteries and various strange events. The storyline blends various Thai beliefs, allowing players to immerse themselves in the atmosphere of an ancient mansion and its mysteries, presented through 2D PixelArt visuals.
